title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 5303.6 - Eligibility to work in the United States
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 5303.6 - Eligibility to work in the United States

State Regulations

No natural person shall be employed as an employee of a
gaming facility licensee or a vendor unless such person is a citizen of the

United States or is otherwise eligible to work in the United

States. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
5303.6

Adopted

New

York State Register September 30, 2015/Volume XXXVII, Issue 39, eff. 9/30/2015

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
